Customizer.title: Design Your Own
Customizer.subtitle: Bespoke Experience
Customizer.description: Create a strap that is uniquely yours. Choose from our selection of premium leathers, stitching styles, and buckle finishes.

Process.title: The Art of Crafting
Process.subtitle: Our Process
Process.desc1: We source only the finest full-grain leathers from renowned tanneries in France and Italy.
Process.desc2: Each strap is hand-cut to specific measurements, ensuring perfect proportions for your wrist.
Process.desc3: The leather is carefully thinned at the ends to ensure a comfortable fit and neat fold.
Process.desc4: Using traditional saddle stitching techniques for superior strength and durability compared to machine stitching.
Process.desc5: Edges are sanded, painted, and polished multiple times to create a smooth, sealed finish.

FeaturedProducts.newCollectionDesc: Explore our latest handcrafted straps, featuring unique leather textures and modern styles.
FeaturedProducts.essentialsDesc: Our most popular straps, loved for their durability, comfort, and classic elegance.

Services.shippingDesc: Free shipping for all orders over $450.

Testimonials.review1: The quality of these straps is exceptional. The leather feels amazing and lasts for years.
Testimonials.review2: I've tried many watch straps, but nothing compares to Aluna. The craftsmanship makes all the difference.
Testimonials.review3: Beautiful packaging, amazing quality, and fast delivery. This has become my go-to gift for special occasions.
